user_template:
<#assign concept = "tuberculosis miliary"> <#-- Replace 'tuberculosis miliary' with the name of a new entity -->
<#assign criteria = "contains">
<@request concept criteria; result> 
  [=result]
</@request>


<#macro request conceptRaw criteria>
  <#assign concept = conceptRaw?replace(" ","%20")>
  <#assign url = "https://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/lookup/descriptor?label="+concept+"&match="+criteria+"&year=current&limit=10">
  <#assign config="{ \"method\" : \"GET\", \"url\" : \""+url+"\" }">
  <#assign descriptors=providers("HttpProvider", config)>
  <#assign url = "https://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/lookup/term?label="+concept+"&match="+criteria+"&limit=10">
  <#assign config="{ \"method\" : \"GET\", \"url\" : \""+url+"\" }">
  <#assign terms=providers("HttpProvider", config)>
  <#assign altDesc = "">
  <#assign altTerm = "">
  <#list descriptors?eval as descriptor>
    <#assign id = descriptor.resource?replace('http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/','')>
    <#assign url = "https://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/lookup/label?resource="+id>
    <#assign config="{ \"method\" : \"GET\", \"url\" : \""+url+"\" }">
    <#assign altDesc= providers("HttpProvider", config)>
  </#list>
 <#list terms?eval as term>
    <#assign id = term.resource?replace('http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/','')>
    <#assign url = "https://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/lookup/label?resource="+id>
    <#assign config="{ \"method\" : \"GET\", \"url\" : \""+url+"\" }">
    <#assign altTerm= providers("HttpProvider", config)>
  </#list>
   <#assign synonyms = "[]">
   <#if altTerm?? && altDesc??> <#assign synonyms = altDesc?replace(']',altTerm?replace('[', ','))> 
   <#elseif altTerm??> <#assign synonyms = altTerm> 
   <#elseif altDesc??> <#assign synonyms = altDesc> 
   </#if>
  <#nested "{\"search\" : \""+conceptRaw+"\", \"descriptors\" : "+descriptors+", \"terms\" : "+terms+", \"synonyms\" : "+synonyms+" }">
  
</#macro>
